faces.stripped_text: click: Flip this identity. You may pay 2 credits fewer when spending a click to trash a resource (not through a card ability).
faces.text:
[click]: Flip this identity.
You may pay 2[credit] fewer when spending a [click] to trash a resource (not through a card ability).

stripped_text: click: Flip this identity. The Runner pays 1 credit more when spending a click to remove a tag (not through a card ability).

title: SYNC: Everything, Everywhere
